description: Styles for the App component in a React application, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, applies background and text color based on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style of the application, vertically and horizontally centers content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with animation on certain conditions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Defines styles for links within the application, including hover transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including position and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation that rotates the app logo.
